divs: Sighting DetailsIt was approximately 10:30 pm -10:45 pm my daughther and I were outside watering the grass. For no apparent reason I looked west up to the sky and at the moment saw 3 bright lights. At first, I thought to my self they were 3 bright stars all lined up horizontal. Suddenly a 4th light appeared, so I said to my self ..(oh its a plane). Then a 5th light appeared, which made me realize this was no plane..for they were not flashing, moving, nor there wasn't any noise. My gut feeling just told me this is ..Weird. I told my daughter who is 11 yrs old ..Mija come here quick and look at the lights but all she got to see was 1 light, due to they dissappeared so quickly as they had appeared. I dont know if what I saw is an UFO or what , but I know I saw something that its gonna be in my head for many days and nights to come...What was it ? Dont know..but I do know that I have seen something that is unexplained in the sky. This is my true story, no I am not insane , nor take drugs, drink, smoke , etc. Call it as u wish.
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Laredo
There were no other sightings in Laredo on or around April 7th 2010
